languages.text: {n}Космодесантник издает утробный рык, лицо его искажает звериная гримаса.{/n} "Одну лишь дерзость прощаю тебе, Вольный Торговец. Впредь — не смей".
{n}The Space Marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I will forgive you this one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Do not utter another."
languages.original_text: {n}Космодесантник издает утробный рык, лицо его искажает звериная гримаса.{/n} "Одну лишь дерзость прощаю тебе, Вольный Торговец. Впредь — не смей".

traits.locale_text: {n}The space marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I'm only going to forgive you for one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Don't you dare utter another."
{n}The space marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I'm only going to forgive you for one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Don't you dare utter another."

{n}The Space Marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I will forgive you this one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Do not utter another."
{n}The Space Marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I will forgive you this one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Do not utter another."

languages.text: {n}乌尔法发出一声咆哮，整张脸扭曲着，仿佛野兽一般。{/n}“像这种无耻的侮辱，我只会原谅一次，行商浪人。如果你再敢说一次，你大可以试试。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I will forgive you this one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Do not utter another."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法发出一声咆哮，整张脸扭曲着，仿佛野兽一般。{/n}“像这种无耻的侮辱，我只会原谅一次，行商浪人。如果你再敢说一次，你大可以试试。”

languages.text: {n}スペースマリーンは獣のような表情に顔をゆがめながら、うなり声を上げた。{/n}「自由開拓者。お前を許すのは、この恥知らずな侮辱一回のみだ。同じ間違いを繰り返すな」
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I will forgive you this one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Do not utter another."

traits.locale_text: {n}スペースマリーンは獣のような表情に顔をゆがめながら、うなり声を上げた。{/n}「自由開拓者。お前を許すのは、この恥知らずな侮辱一回のみだ。同じ間違いを繰り返すな」

languages.text: {n}El Marine Espacial suelta un ruido gutural mientras su cara se retuerce haciéndole parecer una bestia.{/n} «Le perdonaré este único insulto, Comerciante Independiente. No pronuncie otro».
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I will forgive you this one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Do not utter another."

traits.locale_text: {n}El marine espacial suelta un ruido gutural mientras su cara se retuerce haciéndole parecer una bestia.{/n} «Voy a perdonarle un único insulto, Comerciante Independiente. No se atreva a pronunciar otro».

languages.text: {n}Der Space Marine stößt ein tiefes Knurren aus und sein Gesicht verzieht sich zu einem animalischen Ausdruck.{/n} "Diese eine dreiste Beleidigung werde ich Euch verzeihen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Sprecht keine zweite aus."
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I will forgive you this one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Do not utter another."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Space Marine stößt ein tiefes Knurren aus und sein Gesicht verzieht sich zu einem animalischen Ausdruck.{/n} "Ich werde Euch nur eine einzige dreiste Beleidigung verziehen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wagt es ja nicht, eine zweite auszusprechen."

languages.text: {n}Le visage tordu dans une expression bestiale, le Space Wolf pousse un grognement guttural.{/n} « Je vous pardonne cette insulte, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais c'est bien la dernière fois. Ne vous avisez pas de recommencer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I will forgive you this one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Do not utter another."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage tordu dans une expression bestiale, le Space Wolf pousse un grognement guttural.{/n} « Je vous pardonne cette insulte, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais c'est bien la dernière fois. Ne vous avisez pas de recommencer. »

languages.text: {n}Yüzünde canavarımsı bir ifade beliren Uzay Piyadesi, gırtlağından hırıldıyor.{/n} "Bu yersiz hakaretini görmezden geleceğim Hür Tacir. Tek kelime daha etme."
languages.original_text: {n}The Space Marine lets out a guttural growl as his face contorts in a beastlike expression.{/n} "I will forgive you this one brazen insult, Rogue Trader. Do not utter another."
